columns.name: I_REC_NO
columns.description: The record number primary key identifier for the tracking event specified.

columns.name: I_TRANSACTION_NO
columns.description: The transaction identifier for the hours of service data of the tracking event.

columns.name: HOS_RULE_GID
columns.description: The hours of service rule GID for the given tracking event.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME
columns.description: The activity time associated with the hours of service reported for the tracking event.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The activity time unit of measure code.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The activity time in the base unit of measure, time zone.

columns.name: RULE_BEGIN_TIME
columns.description: The begin time defined for the hours of service rule.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_REMAIN
columns.description: The activity time remaining against that hours of service.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_REMAIN_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The activity time remaining unit of measure code.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_REMAIN_BASE
columns.description: The activity time remaining in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PARTITION_KEY
columns.description: The monthly range partition to manage purging status messages.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
